## SubdivisionScheme.getSubdivisionX() method

Returns the number of columns for the given level.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSubdivisionX(level: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  level | number | The level. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
